archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.1.5b: b) critical business processes are supported by a resilient technical infrastructure (e.g. by duplicating business applications, systems and networks and removing single points of failure)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
